comment: Smart Data Models - Transportation /  CityWork schema adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.Transportation/master/CityWork/schema.json
description: The Data Model is a contextual description of urban works carried out on a road axis and which can impact individual (Cars, motorcycle, bicycles, .…) or common transport (Tram, Bus, subway). It contains a geographic representation making it possible to locate its work from a specific JSON Object and at a more global level (Road segment, Road, District, ...) in order to assess the potential impacts on the circulation. A GeoJSON object may represent a region of space (a Geometry), a spatially-bounded entity (

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: contractingAuthority
contents.comment: Name of the contracting authority

contents.name: countOfBusLineImpacted
contents.comment: Count of Bus Lines impacted by the works

contents.name: countOfDerogation
contents.comment: Count of derogations granted to the work Number

contents.name: countOfEventImpacted
contents.comment: Count of Events impacted by the works

contents.name: countOfRailwayLineImpacted
contents.comment: Count of Railway Lines impacted by the works

contents.name: countOfRoadImpacted
contents.comment: Count of roads impacted by the works

contents.name: countOfSchoolBusLineImpacted
contents.comment: Count of School Bus Lines impacted by the works

contents.name: countOfSchoolImpacted
contents.comment: Count of University, School, or other educational resource impacted by the works

contents.name: countOfStationImpacted
contents.comment: Count of Railway stations impacted by the works

contents.name: countOfSubwayLineImpacted
contents.comment: Count of Subway Lines impacted by the works

contents.name: countOfTramwayLineImpacted
contents.comment: Count of tramway lines impacted by the works

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateLastReported
contents.comment: A timestamp which denotes the last time when the device successfully reported data. The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTCformat

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: endDate
contents.comment: End date and time of the works in an ISO8601 UTC format. The attribute can be used in addition to the `workDate` attribute when it corresponds to a time interval to be highlighted

contents.name: isMainRoadImpactedHTR
contents.comment: Value to indicate whether the main traffic road is impacted. Default false. https://schema.org/Boolean

contents.name: isMobile
contents.comment: Characteristic on the mobility of the works : false for Fixed (default) and true for Mobile

contents.name: mainContractingCompany
contents.comment: The Main Contracting Company responsible of the works

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: startDate
contents.comment: Start date and time of the works in an ISO8601 UTC format. The attribute can be used in addition to the `workDate` attribute when it corresponds to a time interval to be highlighted

contents.name: territorialArea
contents.comment: Territorial area. Level higher to the attribute 'areaServed'. A list of Free Text

contents.name: workDate
contents.comment: Date and time (Day or period) of the works. It can be represented by an specific time string

contents.name: workLastDateUpdate
contents.comment: Last date for updating a contractual element of the work

contents.name: workNumber
contents.comment: Number assigned to the work

contents.name: allowedVehicle
contents.comment: Type of vehicle authorized to circulate. A combination of these values. Enum:'all Vehicle, bicycle, bus, car, companiesTrucks,  emergencyVehicle, firefighters, lorry, motorcycle, police, subway, sweepingMachine, trailer, tramway, trucks, van'

contents.name: busImpacted
contents.comment: Bus lines impacted by the works. A structured value from 0 to N occurrences with 2 subproperties per item. First subproperties, one of 'lineId / lineName / lineLocation'. Second subproperties, one of 'segmentId / segmentName / segmentLocation'

contents.name: decrees
contents.comment: A List of text where each element is a string with the URL to download or the name of the decree.

contents.name: derogation
contents.comment: Derogation granted for carrying out work on days and times. A structured value from 0 to N occurrences where each items has the following format `derogationType` :  with sub properties 'startDate, endDate, dayOfWeek, comment'

contents.name: encroachment
contents.comment: Impact of the works on public, private area. A combination of these values. Enum:'other, private, public'

contents.name: eventsImpacted
contents.comment: List of free text or to the entity [Events](https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.TourismDestinations/blob/master/Event/doc/spec.md) if exist.

contents.name: infrastructureFunction
contents.comment: Function of the infrastructure impacted by the works. Enum:'collection, distribution, other, transportation'

contents.name: maxAuthorizedTonnage
contents.comment: Roads impacted by the works with Maximum tonnage authorized. A structured value from 0 to N occurrences with 2 subproperties per item. First subproperties, one of 'roadId / roadName / roadLocation'. Second subproperties, 'maxTonnage'

contents.name: openingHoursSpecification
contents.comment: A structured value providing information about the opening hours of a place or a certain service inside a place

contents.name: othersContractingCompany
contents.comment: A List of Text where each element is a string with the name of the contracting Companies under the responsibility of the main Contracting Company.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: railwayImpacted
contents.comment: Rail lines impacted by the works. A structured value from 0 to N occurrences with 2 subproperties per item. First subproperties, one of 'lineId / lineName / lineLocation'. Second subproperties, one of 'segmentId / segmentName / segmentLocation'

contents.name: roadImpacted
contents.comment: Roads impacted by the works and the details of the roads concerned by the work. A structured value from 0 to N occurrences where each items is a string in the format : 'roadImpact':[List of Segment Impacted or Free Text or geo-property, separated by a comma]. If `isMainRoadImpactedHTR` = true, The first item is this one.

contents.name: roadImpactedMT
contents.comment: A list of roads defined as Major Traffic, impacted by the works. Values are also included in the roadImpacted attribute.

contents.name: roadImpactedSA
contents.comment: A list of roads defined as sensitive areas, impacted by the works. Values are also included in the roadImpacted attribute.

contents.name: schoolBusImpacted
contents.comment: Scholl Bus lines impacted by the works. A structured value from 0 to N occurrences with 2 subproperties per item. First subproperties, one of 'lineId / lineName / lineLocation'. Second subproperties, one of 'segmentId / segmentName / segmentLocation'

contents.name: schoolImpacted
contents.comment: List of free text or [GeoProperty] or a Reference to an entity [SCHOOL] if exist.

contents.name: stationImpacted
contents.comment: Station Impacted by the works. A structured value from 0 to N occurrences with 2 subproperties per item. First subproperties, 'stationType'. Second subproperties, one of 'stationId / stationName / stationLocation'

contents.name: subwayImpacted
contents.comment: Subway lines impacted by the works. A structured value from 0 to N occurrences with 2 subproperties per item. First subproperties, one of 'lineId / lineName / lineLocation'. Second subproperties, one of 'segmentId / segmentName / segmentLocation'

contents.name: tramwayImpacted
contents.comment: Tramway Line impacted by the works. A structured value from 0 to N occurrences with 2 subproperties per item. First subproperties, one of 'lineId / lineName / lineLocation'. Second subproperties, one of 'segmentId / segmentName / segmentLocation'

contents.name: workDisposition
contents.comment: Specific rules taken for the works. A structured value from 0 to N occurrences where each items has the following format : `Disposition`: with sub properties  `startDate`, `endDate`,  `dayOfWeek`, `comment`. Enum:'alternatingLights , bicyclePathClosure, bicyclePathDeviation, bicyclePathReduction, circulationManualControl, laneClosure, laneDeviation, laneReduction, noRestriction, parkingForbidden, parkingModification, sidewalkClosure, sidewalkClosureOrReduction, sidewalkReduction, speedReduction'

contents.name: workLevel
contents.comment: Positioning of the works in relation to a ground reference system. A combination of these elements. Enum:'aerial, ground, mixed, other, roofing, surface, underground, wall'

contents.name: workNature
contents.comment: Nature of the works. A combination of these values.Enum:'additionalInvestigations, brushCutting, cleaning, collection, connection, consolidation, construction, control, counting, craneLifting, creation, demolition, drivingSwitch, experimentation, extension, filmShooting, Installation-OR-layout, investigation, landFill, maintenance, manholeOpening, ManholeOpeningToRestoreService, miscellaneousInstallation, miscellaneousWorks, mowingDeburring, other, overheadLinesWorksIntervention, pruning, pulling, refurbish

contents.name: workOtherImpact
contents.comment: Other impact. A list of free values

contents.name: workReason
contents.comment: Reasons of the works in case of urgent intervention. A combination of these values. Enum:'collapse, derailment, fire, flood, gasLeak, landslide, other, powerCut, rockfall, sagging, waterLeak'

contents.name: workTarget
contents.comment: Categories of works regarding the different profession. A combination of these elements. Enum:'bicyclePath, busCorridor, catainers, cityMotorBike, cityBike, cityCar, cityScooter, coldAndAirCon, coldGroup, copperCable, CoringPenetrometry, drinkingWater, electricityNetworks, exploratoryWork, fireHydrants, frameRoof, gasNetworks, generator, historicalMonuments, infrastructure, landscapedArea, movingHoistNacelleTruck, networks, offStreetParking, opticalFibers, other, overheadLine, papersCollection, pavement, pu

contents.name: workZone
contents.comment: Zone of Works. A combination of these values. Enum:' airport, beach, bicyclePath, bridge, busCorridor, dock, floodArea, harbor, heliport, mountainousArea, offRoad, other, parking, parksGardens, path, protectArea, railwayLine, riskArea, river, road, rockyArea, sevesoArea, sideWalk, subwayLine, tramwayLine, tunnel'

contents.name: contactPoint
contents.comment: The details to contact with the item.
